name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 31, Beijing. An old man participated in the Korean War, but the government did not recognize it, so he came to the National Bureau of Letters and Calls to defend his rights.
October 31, Zhengzhou, Henan. Sunbazhai Village has been demolished for several years, but resettlement has not yet been implemented. The villagers sang the national anthem to defend their rights.
November 2, Jiangsu. The boss of Tiancheng Garment Factory ran away, and the employees defended their rights on the roof.
November 2, Wuhan, Hubei. The Yellow Crane Tower Park owed security guards wages, and the workers gathered together to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 2, Zhoukou, Henan. Huazhiyunchang Senyu Information Technology Company owed disabled workers several months’ wages. When the workers came to the government department to ask for their wages, they were driven away by the staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1 (released) Beijing. An old man came to the Supreme Court to defend his rights, but was forcibly carried away by several policemen. 
October 31 (released), Tianjin. A man has been wrongly accused for 18 years and his case has not been resolved yet. So he knelt outside the Tianjin High People's Court and shouted the name of the president, hoping that the president would come out and make decisions for the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 3, Guangzhou. The Baiyun Airport T3 Terminal project has been in arrears of wages for migrant workers for several months, and the construction site is deserted. As a result, a large number of migrant workers gathered at the airport construction site for several consecutive days to demand wages and defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 2, Chengdu, Sichuan. Jincheng Tiandi Mansion cleared out vendors, which led to a scuffle between vendors and stability maintenance personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, Jiangsu Lianshui Technical Secondary School issued a notice: 
Jiang Ping provided guidance to the teacher. Our teacher Wang was given a warning and a talk, and his qualification for annual evaluation was cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the data released by the Ministry of Civil Affairs' official website showed that in the first three quarters of this year, 4.747 million couples registered for marriage and 1.967 million couples registered for divorce.
The number of marriage registrations in the first three quarters of this year decreased by 943,000 couples compared with last year.
The year-on-year decline in a single quarter was nearly 25%, and the annual data may hit a new low.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 2 (Released) Shandong. A roadside snack stand has a slogan: Japanese and pro-Japanese cultural people, refuse to sell. We are not qualified to forgive on behalf of our ancestors, remember history, and pay tribute to the martyrs.
Netizens replied, "I really don't want to sell to the Japanese, so I'll write the slogan in Japanese."
